message.content: {"id": "14047", "title": "Bug 14047: Inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap", "description": "", "OB": "Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.", "EB": "During text change with word wrap, the StyledText component should perform a more efficient redraw, minimizing the number of redraws of the entire client area.", "SR": "Optimize the redraw process during text change in word wrap mode to reduce the number of redraws of the entire client area."}
